Staz is the vampire boss of a section of the demon world, but he has little interest in human blood.
He's more infatuated with Japanese culture. When he learns that Yanagi Fuyumi, a Japanese teenage
girl, accidentally wanders into the demon city, he jumps to the occasion. However, while Staz deals
with an intruder on his turf, the oblivious Fuyumi is killed by a monster and becomes a wandering
ghost. The disappointed Staz vows to her that he will find a way to bring Fuyumi back to life.

VIDEO

- Video Codec: H.264/AVC
- Video Resolution: 1920x1080p HD (16:9)
- Video FPS: 23.976
